description: This course is designed to be an indepth look at Joomla Content Management System. The information in this course will take a user from installation to building a websites.  The course will cover installing and setting up the Joomla environment, creating categories and articles, adding links and modules, using templates, adding a better editor and a calendar, handling SEO and maintaining and backup your Joomla environment - everything you need to build your website.
title: Joomla Content Management System
